original: 司馬炎雖為主戰派，但苦於胡族侵擾，始終無法覓得良機。經過十餘年，北方局勢稍緩，司馬炎即向吳國宣戰。
text: Although Sima Yan is the main war faction, he suffers from the intrusion of the Hu nationality and has never been able to find a good opportunity. After more than ten years, the situation in the north eased slightly, and Sima Yan declared war on Wu.
